channel.title: Help with commands
channel.description:
Whenever i do a command, it crashes me. Here's what it says in the runserver: [code][client-1-mafia]: playerCommand: starter java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String index out of range: 14 at java.lang.String.substring(Unknown Source) at client.customCommand(client.java:13928) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:23578) at client.packetProcess(client.java:19043) at client.packetSending(client.java:18996) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:153) at server.main(server.java:55) pimpscape Server [fatal] - exception[/code]
It does this with all commands.
